title: AWS Lambda to Amazon EventBridge
description: This pattern creates a Lambda function that publishes an event to EventBridge.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This template deploys a Lambda function that is triggered by an EventBridge rule. In this example, the rule filters for specific attributes in the event before invoking the function.
